description:
This is a world of magic. This is a world in which magic is casually used by everyone.

In a deep, dark forest in this world of magic, there is a boy who is singlemindedly working out. His name is Mash Burnedead, and he has a secret. He can’t use magic.

All he wanted was to live a quiet life with his family, but people suddenly start trying to kill him one day and he somehow finds himself enrolled in Magic School. There, he sets his sights on becoming a “Divine Visionary,” the elite of the elite.

Will his ripped muscles work against the best and brightest of the wizarding world? The curtain rises on this off-kilter magical fantasy in which the power of being jacked crushes any spell!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: MASHLE ศึกโลกเวทมนตร์คนพลังกล้าม

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Fitness
tags.description: Centers around exercise with the aim of improving physical health.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Aromantic
tags.description: Features a character who experiences little to no romantic attraction.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Asexual
tags.description: Features a character who isn't sexually attracted to people of any sex or gender.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

node.description:
Yousuke Kuroda is a Japanese screenwriter. He is affiliated with Studio Orphee and serves as the inside director (board of directors member).

Kuroda is a prolific writer in the anime industry. Having authored and scripted numerous anime series. Including several original productions. Some of the most notable are Infinite Ryvius, Scryed, Please☆Teacher!, Mobile Suit Gundam 00, and Waiting in the Summer.

In 2003, he won the Individual Award at the 8th Animation Kobe event.

__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

[Artist Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/masaruyokoyama) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masaruyokoyama)

**Yokoyama Masaru** is a Japanese composer, arranger, keyboardist and programmer affiliated with Miracle Bus.
A Japanese animator formerly affiliated with [GAINAX](https://anilist.co/studio/6).

__[Website](https://okazakitaiiku.com/) | [Profile (Sony Music)](http://www.sonymusic.co.jp/artist/okazakitaiiku/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/okazaki_taiiku) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/okazaki_taiiku/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/oka.akitoshi?fref=nf) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@okazakitaiiku)__

__Birth Name:__ Akitoshi Oka (岡亮聡)
__Birthplace:__ Nishinomiya City, Hyougo Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Doshisha University (Faculty of Culture and Information Sciences)

__Taiiku Okazaki__, alernatively known as ShitokiaP, is a Japanese voice actor, vocalist, lyricist, composer and arranger under record label SME Records (2016–), affiliated with Sony Music Artists (2019–).

Kuroda is a prolific writer in the anime industry. Having authored and scripted numerous anime series. Including several original productions. Some of the most notable are Infinite Ryvius, Scryed, Please☆Teacher!, Mobile Suit Gundam 00, and Waiting in the Summer.

In 2003, he won the Individual Award at the 8th Animation Kobe event.
